decision_reasoning: Officer's decision was reasonable and aligned with the IRP Regulations
application_details: WES report stated the applicant had two years of undergraduate study and two years of professional study but did not explicitly equate these to a completed Canadian credential
result_of_case: Application dismissed; certified question regarding equivalency assessments
cause_of_action: Applicant's permanent residency application denied due to low education points
procedure_followed: Judicial review of the Officer's decision; analysis of IRP Regulations and WES report
